traits.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.name: Magic Missile (Expends a 1st-Level Spell Slot)
entries: The gnome creates three magical darts. Each dart hits a creature the gnome chooses within 120 feet of it and deals 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Ray of Frost
entries: Ranged Spell atk +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8 damage) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the gnome's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
